body:
Comment 1 by **FrederickMayle**: 
What if you want something like this:

struct incrContainer {
    var incr foo.Incr;
}
func main() {
    var x incrContainer;
    x.incr = foo.NewIncr(1);
}

You could use pointers instead but that isn't the best idea if you are trying to 
avoid memory fragmentation.
